description:
Good morning，ladies and gentlemen,
　 I am very glad to make a speech here in this class again! This time, I'd like to talk something about my family .
   Everyone loves his family. I love my family,too,because I have a happy family.
   There are my father, my mother, and I. We live together very happily and there are many interesting stories about my family.My father is a Chemistry teacher. He teaches chemistry in senior high school. He always tries his best to help every students.Sometimes he works so hard that he can not remember the date.What’s my mother job?Is she a teacher too?Yes,you’re right!My mother is a Chinese teacher. She teaches Chinese in primary school.My mother is very kind and nice.She is always careless on housework,sometimes she makes mistakes.For example, one day, she washed clothes in the washer, after the washer finished the work, she found she had not filled the washer with water.
Now let me tell you a funny thing: one day, father wanted to get up early as usual, but he wasn’t able to do that, because he hadn’t set the alarm clock the night before, so when he got up, he did everything in a hurry. After father left, mother said to me mysteriously, "He will come back soon." "Why?" I was greatly surprised. "Because today is Sunday, his holiday!" Just as mother said, father came back home soon, and went to bed again--he was too tired. You see, what an interesting family have! I hope that you will have one like mine, too.
I love my family so much! 
Thank you!
 
Hi,good morning, 
   It is my pleasure to take this change to introduce my family. I have a happy family. 
   My name is XX. I am 13 years old.I am a beautiful girl.I am a students.I have long straight hair.I am of medium height and I am thin.I have two big eyes,a nice nose and a round face.
   My father is working in another city,so he is always very busy.As a famous saying goes :" There is always an able woman behind a successful man ."My mother is a teacher.She often helps me with English.  My brother's name is XXX.He is tall and handsome.He sometimes play computer games.He often play chess with me.He can play basketball and play soccer,but he likes play PingPong.
   This is my family.What about you? 

本周最热文章

  • 国产修图app火了：老外表示我好美！爱死了！
  • 双语美文：你尽力了，但仍然会出问题
  • 全世界最贵的房子 价值2.5亿美元的豪宅长啥样
  • 囧研究：文化人不愿生孩子 未来人类IQ会下降
  • 双语美文：米歇尔•奥巴马的8句经典名言
  • 外媒：台湾男子献血救到未来老婆 这缘分我服
  • 天天练口语，让你想说就说！
  • TED演讲：是什么阻碍了女性的升职之路？
  • 6个小方法，让你营造更好的办公氛围！
  • 7个学习技巧，好成绩不再难

title: 小学英语演讲稿：我的家庭
